Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
CSC540.WolfWR.services.Services<Transaction,Long>
CSC540.WolfWR.services.TransactionService
@Transactional @Component public class TransactionService extends Services<Transaction,Long>
Service class responsible for handling operations related to Transaction entities.

This class extends the generic Services class and provides business logic for managing Transaction entities, including handling purchases, processing rewards, and generating transaction IDs. It interacts with the TransactionRepository, MerchandiseRepository, and StaffRepository to perform CRUD operations on Transaction, Merchandise, and Staff records in the database.

See Also:

  • TransactionRepository
  • MerchandiseRepository
  • StaffRepository

  • Method Details

    • getRepo

      protected org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Transaction,Long> getRepo()
      Returns the repository used for performing database operations on Transaction entities. This method is implemented from the abstract Services class.
      Specified by:
      getRepo in class Services<Transaction,Long>
      Returns:
      the TransactionRepository instance used to interact with the database.

    • processRewards

      public List<Transaction> processRewards(Member m, LocalDate end)
      Processes the rewards for a given Member based on transactions that occurred before the specified end date.
      Parameters:
      m - The Member whose rewards are to be processed.
      end - The end date for considering transactions for reward processing.
      Returns:
      A list of Transaction entities that are eligible for rewards for the given member.

    • completePurchase

      @Transactional public void completePurchase(Transaction t)
      Completes the purchase for a given Transaction by decrementing the quantity of each product in the transaction. This method updates the Merchandise quantities in the inventory and saves the Transaction entity.
      Parameters:
      t - The Transaction representing the completed purchase.

    • findCashier

      public List<Staff> findCashier(Store s)
      Finds the list of Staff members working as cashiers at a given Store.
      Parameters:
      s - The Store at which the cashiers are working.
      Returns:
      A list of Staff members working as cashiers in the given store.

    • generateID

      public long generateID()
      Generates a unique transaction ID by selecting a random number that does not already exist in the system. It ensures that the generated ID is unique by checking against the list of existing transaction IDs.
      Returns:
      A unique transaction ID.
